title: [tophat] build error, no matching functions
body:
We are building tophat in a container, and hitting [build errors](https://github.com/autamus/registry/pull/88/checks?check_run_id=2118980231).

```bash
==> No patches needed for tophat
==> tophat: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> tophat: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> tophat: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make'

4 errors found in build log:
     479    /opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  -Wall -Wno-strict-aliasing -g -gd
            warf-2 -Wuninitialized  -O3  -DNDEBUG -I./samtools-0.1.18 -pthread 
            -I/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake/gcc-7.5.0/boost-1.75.0-t3
            6skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/include -I./SeqAn-1.4.2 -L./samtools
            -0.1.18 -L./samtools-0.1.18 -L/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skyla
            ke/gcc-7.5.0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/lib  -L.
            /samtools-0.1.18 -L/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake/gcc-7.5.
            0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/lib  -o bam_merge b
            am_merge.o libtophat.a libgc.a -lbam -lz
     480    /opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I..     -Wall
             -Wno-strict-aliasing -g -gdwarf-2 -Wuninitialized  -O3  -DNDEBUG -
            I./samtools-0.1.18 -pthread -I/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skyla
            ke/gcc-7.5.0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/include 
            -I./SeqAn-1.4.2 -MT map2gtf.o -MD -MP -MF .deps/map2gtf.Tpo -c -o m
            ap2gtf.o map2gtf.cpp
     481    mv -f .deps/map2gtf.Tpo .deps/map2gtf.Po
     482    /opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  -Wall -Wno-strict-aliasing -g -gd
            warf-2 -Wuninitialized  -O3  -DNDEBUG -I./samtools-0.1.18 -pthread 
            -I/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake/gcc-7.5.0/boost-1.75.0-t3
            6skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/include -I./SeqAn-1.4.2 -L./samtools
            -0.1.18 -L./samtools-0.1.18 -L/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skyla
            ke/gcc-7.5.0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/lib  -L.
            /samtools-0.1.18 -L/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake/gcc-7.5.
            0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/lib  -o map2gtf map
            2gtf.o libtophat.a libgc.a -lbam -lz
     483    /opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I..     -Wall
             -Wno-strict-aliasing -g -gdwarf-2 -Wuninitialized  -O3  -DNDEBUG -
            I./samtools-0.1.18 -pthread -I/opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skyla
            ke/gcc-7.5.0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/include 
            -I./SeqAn-1.4.2 -MT tophat_reports.o -MD -MP -MF .deps/tophat_repor
            ts.Tpo -c -o tophat_reports.o tophat_reports.cpp
     484    tophat_reports.cpp: In function 'void driver(const string&, std::is
            tream&, const std::vector<std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> >&, cons
            t string&, const std::vector<std::__cxx11::basic_string<char> >&, c
            onst string&, FILE*, FILE*, FILE*, FILE*)':
  >> 485    tophat_reports.cpp:2708:128: error: no matching function for call t
            o 'make_pair<Junction, JunctionStats>(Junction, JunctionStats&)'
     486         gtf_junctions.insert(make_pair<Junction, JunctionStats>(Juncti
            on(ref_id, left_coord, right_coord, antisense), junction_stat));
     487                                                                       
                                                                         ^
     488    In file included from /usr/include/c++/7/bits/stl_algobase.h:64:0,
     489                     from /usr/include/c++/7/bits/char_traits.h:39,
     490                     from /usr/include/c++/7/string:40,
     491                     from /opt/software/linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake/gcc-7
            .5.0/boost-1.75.0-t36skykf7qk2sohheekq67px5w2eisr4/include/boost/th
            read/exceptions.hpp:20,

     ...

     499         ^~~~~~~~~
     500    /usr/include/c++/7/bits/stl_pair.h:524:5: note:   template argument
             deduction/substitution failed:
     501    tophat_reports.cpp:2708:128: note:   cannot convert 'junction_stat'
             (type 'JunctionStats') to type 'JunctionStats&&'
     502         gtf_junctions.insert(make_pair<Junction, JunctionStats>(Juncti
            on(ref_id, left_coord, right_coord, antisense), junction_stat));
     503                                                                       
                                                                         ^
     504    Makefile:1571: recipe for target 'tophat_reports.o' failed
  >> 505    make[2]: *** [tophat_reports.o] Error 1
     506    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-topha
            t-2.1.2-rydfsrplqr4xdjkemkyqaigqqoxa2x4t/spack-src/src'
     507    Makefile:388: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
  >> 508    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     509    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-topha
            t-2.1.2-rydfsrplqr4xdjkemkyqaigqqoxa2x4t/spack-src'
     510    Makefile:329: recipe for target 'all' failed
  >> 511    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-tophat-2.1.2-rydfsrplqr4xdjkemkyqaigqqoxa2x4t/spack-build-out.txt

==> Error: Terminating after first install failure: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make'
```
The spack.yaml looks like this:

```yaml
spack:
  specs: ["tophat"]
  view: true
  container:
    os_packages:
      build:
        - python3-dev
      final:
        - ca-certificates
    strip: false
```

This is possibly related to #21737.
